newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business Sept 12.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business Sept 12.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on September 12:
WASHINGTON - Prices remain stable, according to a survey by the Federal Reserve Board.
NEW YORK - Contrary to its normal pattern, the stock market had been rising in September.
NEW YORK - Bank credit card losses at their highest level since 1992, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp reported.
WASHINGTON - Computer hackers paralysed a New York Internet access company over the weekend.
